segments.text: I see the woman so absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying the plate with care, like it's important.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water from the sink is flooding out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's ruining the floor and cabinets, what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are trying to get cookies secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it could be really bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits eagerly, but this feels wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a calm garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the mom would notice and keep everyone safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to see potential trouble ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All this domestic scene turning into disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor family, I hope it ends okay.
segments.speaker: PAR
